title: I'm Dating a Psychopath
description: When a new serial killer arises in her city, Finn suspects that he may be related to her past. Against her better judgement, she decides to pursue him in hopes of finding answers. Shortly after, Finn meets Isaac, who reminds her too much of the mysterious boy from her past...

title: Getting It Straight!
description:
Fiona Pearce is the kind of girl who can never say no to anyone. As long as she can do something to help out, she'll do it in a heartbeat.

So when her father faces a problem and asks for her help to find her missing brother, she's more than willing to extend a hand and go the extra mile. She sets off on a journey to find the missing boy in a population of a four hundred and sixty-five. The only problem is, Corner Stone is not just an ordinary high school.

It is an exclusive school... for boys.

title: Two Suns Apart
description:
Seren loved Adam for as long as she could remember. He was her first heartbreak, the boy who never looked her way.
Years later, fate brings them back together… And for the first time, Adam finally sees her. But this time, Seren’s heart might already belong to someone else.
